data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kurina, Olavi, Ounap, Erki, Ramel, Gordon (2011): Baeopterogyna mihalyii Matile (Diptera, Mycetophilidae): association of sexes using morphological and molecular approaches with the first description of females. ZooKeys 114: 15-27, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.114.1364, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.114.1364
